item.description: If it is good wheather the day of the meet up we can hold it outside in our large, fenced-in, play yard. If there happens to be those nagging April showers then we can have the meet up in our spacious indoor play room. Hope to see you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask anyone at the front desk!

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs April Meetup
